title: (x) NZ Rugby magazine cover - Tempo Heavy Cond, Neue Helvetica {Marten F, Yves}
content:
I am wanting to know what font is used for this magazine...including the tittle of the magazine. Can any one help me?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [103\_NZRW\_July\_Cover\_110x156.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/typophile.com/files/103_NZRW_July_Cover_110x156.jpg) | 0 bytes |

 [‹ (x) News Scan tech sans - ITC Conduit {Antonio Cavedoni}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36708 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Mercedes Benz campaign font - Corporate A {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12962 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mike palmer

comments.content: i can’t see an image Mike.
hahaha why did so many get posted? My bad sorry about that guys
hahaha why did so many get posted? My bad sorry about that guys
hahaha why did so many get posted? My bad sorry about that guys

Great multi-posting work, Mike!

The title look’s a bit lika a squooshed [Swank Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/swank-gothic/cond-bold/)...

Sorry! This one was already answered [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/typophile.com/node/36350) and I was wrong. It’s not Swank but [Tempo Heavy Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411125945/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=201580)...
The headline is set in a very bold weight of Helvetica, most probably Neue.
